meta.title: 李可喻
meta.description: 我是一个好人，你就不要想起我
meta.author: 李可喻

pages.text: /* 页头和页脚背景透明 */ #page-header { background: transparent !important; } #footer { background: transparent !important; } /* 文章页面正文背景 */ div#post { background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); } /* 移除top-img黑色透明玻璃效果 */ #page-header:not(.not-top-img):before { background-color: transparent !important; } #card_author { background-color: yellow; } /* 评论输入框 */ .ValineEditor { border: 1px solid #af1111; padding: 10px; font-size: 16px; } /* 评论列表整体 */ .Valine-comment-list { padding: 15px; } /* 每条评论 */ .Valine-comment { border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 15px; margin-bottom: 15px; } /* 评论者头像 */ .Valine-comment.vimg { width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 50%; } /* 评论者姓名 */ .Valine-comment.vnickname { font-weight: bold; } /* 评论内容 */ .Valine-comment.vcontent { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; } /* 回复按钮 */ .Valine-comment.vreplies { color: #d32b5b; cursor: pointer; }

posts.title: 第二篇博文
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1234$ hexo new "My New Post"$ hexo server$ hexo server$ hexo server More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy [up主专用，视频内嵌代码贴在这] .video-container { position: relative; width: 100%; padding-top: 56.25%; /* 16:9 aspect ratio (height/width = 9/16 * 100%) */ } .video-container iframe { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; }

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1234$ hexo new "My New Post"$ hexo server$ hexo server$ hexo server More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: vpn教程
posts.text: 科学上网方式有两种，一种是获取机场的节点然后配合V2rayN，Clash，小火箭等第三方软件来实现科学上网。卖节点的网站就是我们俗称的机场。第二种是直接使用vpn软件，这类软件已经内置节点，可以实现一键上网，但附加功能比较少，不能导入自己的节点，可以理解为套壳了内置的机场节点协议的小程序，然后起个名 “XX VPN”或者“XX加速器”。 市面上机场和VPN软件没有几万种也有几千种，有收费的也有免费的。这里只讨论如何免费实现科学上网。 [https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zE4GiCV7iMyuhZc95KOa5CV6Fq8TSjSr/view?usp=sharing] .video-container { position: relative; width: 100%; padding-top: 56.25%; /* 16:9 aspect ratio (height/width = 9/16 * 100%) */ } .video-container iframe { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; }
